avoidDuplicates.description: Ignores apps where an app with the same href already exists

onlyImportApps.label: Only import apps
onlyImportApps.description: Only adds the apps, the board need to be recreated manually

sidebarBehavior.label: Sidebar behavior
sidebarBehavior.description: Sidebars were removed in 1.0, you can select what should happen with the items inside them.

lastSection.label: Last section
lastSection.description: Sidebar will be displayed below the last section

removeItems.label: Remove items
removeItems.description: Items contained in the sidebar will be removed

fixed.label: Fixed
fixed.description: Background stays in the same position.

repeat.label: Repeat
repeat.description: The image is repeated as much as needed to cover the whole background image painting area.

no-repeat.label: No repeat
no-repeat.description: The image is not repeated and may not fill the entire space.

repeat-x.label: Repeat X
repeat-x.description: Same as 'Repeat' but only on horizontal axis.

repeat-y.label: Repeat Y
repeat-y.description: Same as 'Repeat' but only on vertical axis.

cover.label: Cover
cover.description: Scales the image as small as possible to cover the entire window by cropping excessive space.

contain.label: Contain
contain.description: Scales the image as large as possible within its container without cropping or stretching the image.

customCss.label: Custom css for this board
customCss.description: Inoltre, personalizza la dashboard utilizzando i CSS, consigliato solo agli utenti esperti

customClassesAlert.title: Custom classes
customClassesAlert.description: You can add custom classes to your board items in the advanced options of each item and use them in the custom CSS above.

isPublic.label: Pubblico
isPublic.description: Public boards are accessible by everyone, even without an account.

general.title: Generale
general.unrecognizedLink: The provided link is not recognized and won't preview, it might still work.

rename.label: Rename board
rename.description: Changing the name will break any links to this board.

public.title: Make board private
public.description: Are you sure you want to make this board private? This will hide the board from the public. Links for guest users will break.

private.title: Make board public
private.description: Are you sure you want to make this board public? This will make the board accessible to everyone.

delete.label: Delete this board
delete.description: Once you delete a board, there is no going back. Please be certain.

confirm.title: Elimina board
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this board? This will permanently delete the board and all its content.

badge.label: Home
badge.tooltip: This board will show as your home board

confirm.title: Elimina board
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete the {name} board?

user.fieldsDisabledExternalProvider: Certain fields are disabled because they are managed by an external authentication provider.

groups.label: Groups
groups.title: Select all groups user should be member of
groups.description: The {everyoneGroup} group is assigned to all users and can not be removed.

new.title: New invite
new.description: Dopo la scadenza, un invito non sarà più valido e il destinatario dell'invito non potrà creare un account.

copy.title: Copy invite
copy.description: Your invitation has been generated. After this modal closes, you'll not be able to copy this link anymore. If you do no longer wish to invite said person, you can delete this invitation any time.

delete.title: Elimina invito
delete.description: Siete sicuri di voler eliminare questo invito? Gli utenti con questo link non potranno più creare un account utilizzando tale link.

general.title: Generale
general.ownerOfGroupDeleted: The owner of this group was deleted. It currently has no owner.

error.message: Failed to save settings

general.title: Send anonymous analytics
general.text: Homarr will send anonymized analytics using the open source software Umami. It never collects any personal information and is therefore fully GDPR & CCPA compliant. We encourage you to enable analytics because it helps our open source team to identify issues and prioritize our backlog.

widgetData.title: Widget data
widgetData.text: Send which widgets (and their quantity) you have configured. Does not include URLs, names or any other data.

integrationData.title: Integration data
integrationData.text: Send which integrations (and their quantity) you have configured. Does not include URLs, names or any other data.

usersData.title: Users data
usersData.text: Send the amount of users and whether you've activated SSO

crawlingAndIndexing.title: Crawling and Indexing
crawlingAndIndexing.warning: Enabling or disabling any settings here will severely impact how search engines will index & crawl your page. Any setting is a request and it is up to the crawler to apply these settings. Any modification may take up to multiple days or weeks to apply. Some settings may be search engine specific.

noIndex.title: No index
noIndex.text: Do not index the website on search engines and don't show it in any search results

noFollow.title: No follow
noFollow.text: Do not follow any links while indexing. Disabling this will lead to crawlers attempting to follow all links on Homarr.

noTranslate.title: No translate
noTranslate.text: When the site language is likely not that the user is likely to want to read, Google will show a translation link in the search results

noSiteLinksSearchBox.title: No site links search box
noSiteLinksSearchBox.text: Google will build a search box with the crawled links along with other direct links. Enabling this will ask Google to disable that box.

homeBoard.label: Global home board
homeBoard.description: Only public boards are available for selection

createApiToken.title: API token created
createApiToken.description: API token was created. Be careful, this token is encrypted in the database and will never be transferred again to you. If you loose this token, you'll no longer be able to retrieve this specific token.

about.text: Homarr is a community driven open source project that is being maintained by volunteers. Thanks to these people, Homarr has been a growing project since 2021. Our team is working completely remote from many different countries on Homarr in their leisure time for no compensation.
